title: ISic020463. ISic020463
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΑΛΚΙΜΙΔΑΙ

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena (IGASM 2)

English translation

To Alkimides.

Italian translation

Per Alkimides.

commentary

According to Arena, this could be either a singular dative of the name Ἀλκιμίδης or a plural nominative, thus referring to a clan of dedicators (cf. Ἡρακλεῖδαι). Agostiniani (1999), on the other hand, is inclined towards a feminine noun with an -αι ending typical of the Elymian texts found in Grotta Vanella, Segesta.

bibliography

  • Arena 2002 15, pl. VII.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373
  • Agostiniani 1999 432 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002199
